front.title: Use of Password Based Message Authentication Code 1 (PBMAC1) in PKCS #12 Syntax

abstract.t: This document specifies additions and amendments to RFCs 7292 and 8018. It defines a way to use the Password Based Message Authentication Code 1, defined in RFC 8018, inside the PKCS #12 syntax. The purpose of this specification is to permit use of more modern PBKDFs and allow for regulatory compliance.
